answerText: What's Opera, Doc?[10] Arthur Q. Bryan provided the voice of Elmer Fudd for the short, but Bugs Bunny was, as usual, voiced by this man, the voice of Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, and countless other Looney Tunes.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Lawrence U and Georgia Tech | 8 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: It features Bugs Bunny's entrance on a horse of "operatic proportions" and Elmer Fudd's solo, "Oh Bwunhilde, you'w so wuvwy." For 10 points each:  [10] Name this 1957 cartoon short directed by Chuck Jones, a spoof of the operas of Richard Wagner. Repeatedly picked as the #1 cartoon of all time, its title references Bugs's catchphrase.
